def notify():
    """Using desktop notifications in MacOS.
   
    ..note::

    To keep the notification button until you close it change the
    system preferences of the notifications.
    System Preferences > Notifications > Script Editor > Check all and choose alert
     
    """


import os
def notify(title, text):
    os.system("""
              osascript -e 'display notification "{}" with title "{}"'
              """.format(text, title))

notify("Title", "Heres an alert")
